venue.address_2: 1.5 miles south of Rt. 130 on Rt. 13
venue.name: Andres Institute of Art

item.description: Its an hour from Boston area in Brookline NH- people can hopefully carpool, meet up there, walk around for a couple hours, pack snacks/lunch.  Only serious rain cancels. Advised to bring bug spray, trail map available here: http://www.andresinstitute.org/Webtrailmap....
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at trailhead kiosk in the public parking area (see map)
item.name: Walk the trails 140 acre sculpture park, Andres Institute of Art
